description: This action step lets you loop over a collection held within a JSON object
label: Json Loop

options.name: input
options.label: Input
options.info: The JSON or Text you want to use to loop over.

options.name: path
options.label: Path
options.info: The path defines the node within the JSON/Text that you want to loop over. Define a path by entering the node name, use a dot (.) to traverse deeper into subnodes. Leave blank to loop over the root node.

options.name: iterator
options.label: Iterator name
options.info: The name for the iterator under which the object of each iteration will be available.

options.name: index
options.label: Index
options.info: The name for the variable under which the current iteration will be available. Starts at 0. For example, in the 1st iteration this variable holds the value 0 and in 10th iteration, this variable holds the value 9.
